About School

Karnataka Residential Educational Institutions Society (KREIS) - Empowering rural students through quality residential education since 1999.

About Kittur Rani Chennamma Residential School, Balepura

Kittur Rani Chennamma Residential School, Balepura was established with the noble intention of providing inclusive and quality education to students from all walks of life by the Government of Karnataka. With a residential setup that fosters discipline and focused learning, the school aims to provide a nurturing atmosphere where students grow intellectually, emotionally, and socially.

Our school is a symbol of women empowerment and cultural pride, drawing inspiration from Rani Chennamma‚Äôs legacy. Equipped with dedicated faculty, a well-structured curriculum, and modern facilities, we strive to create responsible citizens and lifelong learners.

Empowering young minds through quality education, discipline, and holistic development, the school stands as a beacon of academic excellence. Join us in shaping the journey of knowledge, values, and a brighter tomorrow.

Principal‚Äôs Message

"Education is not just about textbooks and classrooms‚Äîit is about lighting the fire of curiosity, building values, and fostering leadership."

At our school, we take pride in offering a comprehensive learning environment where tradition meets innovation. We believe in nurturing every child‚Äôs unique potential and instilling in them a sense of responsibility, confidence, and compassion. Our dedicated staff ensures academic excellence alongside strong character and discipline.

Warm regards,

Bhaskar Babu

Principal, Kittur Rani Chennamma Residential School, Balepura
